product_name: Lorpen T3 Light Ski Socks - Women's - 2014 Closeout
long_description: Designed for demanding technical skiing, these women's socks feature a 3-layer design with PrimaLoft yarn, superfine, nano-washed merino wool and nylon for the friction areas.
short_description: Designed for demanding technical skiing, these women's socks feature a 3-layer design with PrimaLoft yarn, superfine, nano-washed merino wool and nylon for the friction areas.
